title: John Bowe: "I Have Something to Say"
description: Award-winning journalist John Bowe on his book, "I Have Something to Say: Mastering the Art of Public Speaking in an Age of Disconnection." Original air date 11 August 2020. The book was published on 11 August 2020.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, John Bowe)
